quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that things are difficult.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid.

quotes.author: Jocko Willink
quotes.quote: Discipline equals freedom. The more disciplined you are, the more freedom you will have.

quotes.author: David Goggins
quotes.quote: You are in danger of living a life so comfortable and soft, that you will die without ever realizing your true potential.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

quotes.author: Nietzsche
quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

quotes.author: Ryan Holiday
quotes.quote: The obstacle is the way.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: Work like hell. I mean you just have to put in 80 to 100 hour weeks every week. This improves the odds of success.

quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quotes.quote: You can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.

quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk
quotes.quote: Stop whining, start hustling.

quotes.author: Tim Grover
quotes.quote: Being relentless means demanding more of yourself than anyone else could ever demand of you, knowing that every time you stop, you can still do more.

quotes.author: Kobe Bryant
quotes.quote: I’ll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it’s sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.

quotes.author: Tom Bilyeu
quotes.quote: How you do anything is how you do everything.

quotes.author: Jordan Peterson
quotes.quote: If you don’t say what you think, then you kill your unborn self.

quotes.author: Warren Buffett
quotes.quote: The chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.

quotes.author: Andy Frisella
quotes.quote: Stop thinking about what you could have done better yesterday and start focusing on what you can do better today.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

quotes.author: Eric Thomas
quotes.quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.

quotes.author: David Goggins
quotes.quote: Most people who are craving success and don’t make it, it’s because they’re not willing to go through the grind, the pain, and the obstacles that it takes to get there.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: Do nothing that is of no use.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.

quotes.author: Ray Dalio
quotes.quote: It is far more common for people to allow ego to stand in the way of learning.

quotes.author: Plato
quotes.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself.

quotes.author: Jocko Willink
quotes.quote: There is no shortcut. There is no hack. There’s only one way: So get after it.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Genius is 1% talent and 99% hard work.

quotes.author: Jack Ma
quotes.quote: Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.

quotes.author: Frederick Douglass
quotes.quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.

quotes.author: Muhammad Ali
quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

quotes.author: Mark Cuban
quotes.quote: Work like there is someone working 24 hours a day to take it all away from you.

quotes.author: Henry Rollins
quotes.quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.

quotes.author: William Ernest Henley
quotes.quote: I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul.

quotes.author: Julius Caesar
quotes.quote: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Don’t explain your philosophy. Embody it.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: You must understand that there is more than one path to the top of the mountain.

quotes.author: Grant Cardone
quotes.quote: Success is your duty, obligation, and responsibility.

quotes.author: David Goggins
quotes.quote: I don’t stop when I’m tired. I stop when I’m done.

quotes.author: Tim Grover
quotes.quote: Relentless is about never being satisfied, always driving to be the best, and then getting even better.

quotes.author: Jocko Willink
quotes.quote: Don’t expect to be motivated every day. What you need is to be disciplined.

quotes.author: Jordan Peterson
quotes.quote: You're not everything you could be, and you know it.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: Do not pray for an easy life; pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.

quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.quote: The desire for more positive experience is itself a negative experience.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.

quotes.author: Naval Ravikant
quotes.quote: The more you desire something, the more you’ll suffer.

quotes.author: Andy Frisella
quotes.quote: The truth is that giving up is way harder than trying.

quotes.author: Kobe Bryant
quotes.quote: I have nothing in common with lazy people who blame others for their lack of success.

quotes.author: Will Smith
quotes.quote: There’s no reason to have a Plan B because it distracts from Plan A.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.quote: You must be willing to do what others won’t do, to have what others won’t have.

quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

quotes.author: Eric Thomas
quotes.quote: Don’t make a habit out of choosing what feels good over what’s actually good for you.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.

quotes.author: Patrick Bet-David
quotes.quote: You don’t need approval from others to be successful, you need approval from yourself.

quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quotes.quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: I’m convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.

quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan
quotes.quote: You must get comfortable with being uncomfortable if you want to be successful.

quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli
quotes.quote: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.

quotes.author: Robert Greene
quotes.quote: Your persistence must outlast the resistance.

quotes.author: Cal Newport
quotes.quote: If you don’t produce, you won’t thrive—no matter how skilled or talented you are.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are against you, you should still do it.

quotes.author: Donald Trump
quotes.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: Successful people do what they need to do whether they feel like it or not.

quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine
quotes.quote: To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.

quotes.author: Joe Rogan
quotes.quote: Greatness and madness are next-door neighbors, and they often borrow each other’s sugar.

quotes.author: James Clear
quotes.quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.

quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg
quotes.quote: Done is better than perfect.

quotes.author: Victor Hugo
quotes.quote: He who opens a school door closes a prison.

quotes.author: Teddy Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said.

quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone
quotes.quote: The world ain't all sunshine and rainbows. It's a very mean and nasty place and I don’t care how tough you are, it will beat you to your knees and keep you there permanently if you let it.

quotes.author: Ayn Rand
quotes.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.

quotes.author: David Goggins
quotes.quote: Be more than motivated, be more than driven, become literally obsessed to the point where people think you’re fucking nuts.

quotes.author: Tom Brady
quotes.quote: I didn’t come this far to only come this far.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
